title: Stripped Down
description: His best friend’s hot older sister. Her younger brother’s annoying sidekick. And one forbidden kiss in high school…  It was complicated back then. It’s even more so now.  Because former mean girl Sloane rolls back in town to find Rick stripping at a charity event like he was born with biceps. And single dad Rick is her landlord.  And her brother will murder him if he has sex with her.  But sometimes you have to strip it all down to see what was there all along...
author: Erin McCarthy
